Detailed Description

This file contains an internal implementation of the memove/memcpy functions.

Author:
Szymon Stefanek If COMPILE_WITH_SYSTEM_MEMMOVE is disabled, kvirc will use its internal implementation of the memmove/memcpy family of functions. If COMPILE_ix86_ASM is enabled, the implementation is based on x86 (32-bit only) asm.

Parameters:

void *
Warning:
In fastmove the src and dst may not overlap
